Pre-Game Insights: India will need to bring their A-game to secure a spot in the semi-finals, where only the top two teams from each group will advance.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The T20 World Cup 2024 will commence on June 2nd in the United States and West Indies.
The Men in Blue will face Ireland on June 5th at the iconic Nassau County International Cricket Stadium in New York.
Cricket aficionados in India can catch every ball, every wicket, and every moment of the T20 World Cup extravaganza live on the Star Sports network.
Others: The top two teams from each of the four groups will advance to the Super Eight stage.
The winners of the two semi-finals will compete in the final match to determine the T20 World Cup 2024 champion.
